title: The Murder House
description: No. 7 Ocean Drive is a gorgeous, multi-million-dollar beachfront estate in the Hamptons, where money and privilege know no bounds. But its beautiful gothic exterior hides a horrific past.
author: James Patterson

title: Truth or Die
description: After a serious professional stumble, attorney Trevor Mann may have finally hit his stride. Hes found happiness with his girlfriend Claire Parker, a beautiful, ambitious journalist always on the hunt for a scoop.
author: James Patterson
